tooltip.avaliextended.aerogel.shift_down: The aerogel is an ephemeral lattice of molecules with incredible structural properties, despite weighing next to nothing.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.piru_colony.toolti: Small, barnacle-like colonies which grow long frond-like feeding filaments.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.nakati_ovoid.toolt: A biolumiscent ovoid. Eventually this will grow into a colony.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.spicy_jerky.toolti: Chunks of seasoned jerky, popular with hunters and explorers.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.kiri_fruit.tooltip: The fruiting body of a subterranean slime mould. This one has already sporing though.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.kiri_cider.tooltip: Slightly fermented kiri juice including a bit the ground-up rind and a dash of nakati
tooltip.avaliexpanded.tucker.tooltip: Just like normal cookies, only spikier.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.woven_graphene.too: Grapene that's been woven specially for use in avaly crafting stations.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.woven_fabric.toolt: A small square of woven fabric
tooltip.avaliexpanded.protosteel_ingot.t: A complex nanite-infused alloy, used to create strong weapons and armour.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.nanite_injector.to: A small Nanite Injector, used in crafting recipes.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.nakati_bark.toolti: The spicy bark of the nakati plant. Usually ground up before use.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.avali_bottle.toolt: A bottle made in aerogel, able to contain and conserve it's content
tooltip.avaliexpanded.aeromer.tooltip: All the benefits of aerogel, but with structural integrity!
tooltip.avaliexpanded.titanium_ingot.too: Result of the smelting of titanium ore primarily found in temperate climate.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.durasteel_ingot.to: Result of the smelting of durasteel ore primarily found in arid climate.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.refined_aegisalt.t: Result of the smelting of aegisalt ore primarily found in cold climate.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.piru_noodle.toolti: Sweet noodles made from piru frond flour, a staple for young avali.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.piru_flour.tooltip: Piru frond, ground down into a versatile flour-like substance. Not exactly edible.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.kiri_curry.tooltip: Spicy meat noodles with a rich kiri sauce.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.groou.tooltip: uicy and sweet, similar to jelly.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.avalon_taco.toolti: Super-hot nakati-spiced taco; sometimes eaten on a dare by non-avali.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.avali_muffin.toolt: It was covered with kiri jam and decorated with some dried fruit of Tucker
tooltip.avaliexpanded.kirikiri_pie.toolt: A sour oculemon-filled pie with a sweet meringue topping.
tooltip.avaliexpanded.piru_frond.tooltip: A long, fibrous frond from a piru barnacle.
